name: MOVEON (Grouppo)
description:
INTRO
Move on is a game platform that represents psychological theory, in-game we expect to show another perspective of "the 5 stages of grief" theory in-game you have to climb up the stage of emotion in each emotion have different gameplay, this game doesn't have any save or checkpoint once you die you will respawn at the first stage as always we believe "suffer is a key to learn" and we want to give you an experience of MOVE ON so get ready and keep going Let's
MOVE ON!!!

Gameplay: platform Playtime: 8 min (depending on the player)

control

walkW A S DJumpspace
